attributes.action: For every UK school traditionally to serve fish on Fridays.
attributes.additional_details: It is important that the tradition of eating fish on Fridays is presumed but in today's era, the tradition is not being used in most UK schools. , It is the majority of the UK children. Fish is one of the most beneficial protein sources for your diet. It’s filled with essential nutrients, like omega-3  and fish is a great source of protein to keep your body lean and your muscles strong. functions of your body including your liver, brain, sleep and it helps most children that just hit puberty.
attributes.background: I want the UK Parliament to make it law for UK schools to serve fish every Friday just like the tradition of fishy Friday .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to serve fish on Fridays are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
